name: copernicus
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write academic papers of Copernicus journals. Support both the two-columned pdf version and the discussion version.

name: docsens
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A template from the book [Lokal lagring og bruk av sensitive data](https://bookdown.org/areedv/docSens/)

name: elsevier
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write academic papers of Elsevier journals.

name: journal
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Laboratory journal or personal diary.

name: mail
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write elegant traditional mails. Multiple themes are available.

name: mdpi
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write academic papers in the layout of MDPI journals.

name: nonpar
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A book template from the book [A short course on nonparametric curve estimation](https://bookdown.org/egarpor/nonpar-eafit/)

name: nte_zh
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A template from Nothing to envy, in Chinese. (中文散文模板。)

name: paper_zh
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write academic manuscript in Chinese with bilingual titles, author lists, abstracts, and keywords. (中文学术论文模板。支持双语标题、作者、摘要、关键词。)

name: pku_zh
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write a thesis of Peking University with R markdown syntax. (北京大学学位论文模板。)

name: poem
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A poem book.

name: rbasics
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A template from the book [Getting used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown](https://ismayc.github.io/rbasics-book/)

name: classic
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Classic thesis.

name: thesis_zh
author: Peng Zhao
intro: A simple template for thesis in Chinese. (简单的中文学位论文模板。)

name: ubt
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Thesis of University of Bayreuth

name: ucas_zh
author: Peng Zhao
intro: Write a thesis of the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences. (中国科学院大学学位论文模板。)
